name: SAMAJIK VIKAS SANSTHAN
briefDescription: SAMAJIK VIKAS SANSTHAN was established in the year 1987 to eradicate the social ills and evils to build a discrimination and violence free society through economic, education and health empowerment of women & children of downtrodden section of society to establish gender equality. Dalit, women and children from the deprived section of the community are key focus area of the organization. The organization is actively raising the voice of voiceless and supporting to the poor to advocate for themselves for the betterment of their livelihood and enjoy their rights and entitlement.The idea of starting the organization was mooted by Rameshwar Mahto by getting inspiration from Mahatama Gandhi and Lok Nayak Jayprakash.
